text: Caldermill is a hamlet in South Lanarkshire, Scotland. Caldermill is south- west of Strathaven, and is the next settlement a driver will come across after leaving Strathaven on the A71 westbound towards Kilmarnock. Caldermill is a hamlet of just a few houses, but has history linked with that of the covenanters. For children raised in Caldermill, the closest primary school is Gilmourton Primary, in the nearby hamlet of Drumclog, which is further along the A71 towards Kilmarnock. The nearest high school is Strathaven Academy, located in the town of Strathaven. Category:Hamlets in Scotland
